document_data.name: Sa'ib al-Banu
document_data.mainbody: Imam '''Sa'ib al-Banu''' was a high priest and [[wererat]] inhabiting the ruined city of [[Moradask]] on the [[Sea of Salt]] in the [[Haunted Lands]] of [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: He stood {{SI|5'5"|ft-in}} tall and was heavily muscled. He habitually shaved all of the hair from his body.
document_data.Personality: Sa'ib was quiet but spoke with wisdom and authority.
document_data.History: He was originally from [[Talab]] in the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] and received his training as a [[Mystic (Zakhara)|mystic]] there.
document_data.Activities: He experienced a strong vision once while adventuring within the [[Cities of the Ancients]] where the [[Zakharan pantheon|Pantheist]] gods revealed that his hair was a filthy trait and should be shorn from his body if he wished to attain spiritual perfection. Despite being openly ridiculed for his new belief system, Sa'ib gained a strong following in Talab until he and his followers were exiled for smuggling weapons. [[Fate]] guided Sa'ib and his followers to Moradask where they could prosper without harassment. It was here that Sa'ib discovered a shrine to [[Ishistu]], a savage albino rat god. The idol of Ishistu lacked any body hair and Sa'ib took this as a sign to begin worship the rat god.
document_data.Abilities: Sa'ib usually had the following [[spell]]s memorized: ''[[bless]]'', ''[[command]]'', ''[[cure light wounds]]'', ''[[detect evil]]'', ''[[endure heat]]'', ''[[light]]'', ''[[aid]]'', ''[[augury]]'', ''[[continual light]]'', ''[[hold person]]'', ''[[know alignment]]'', ''[[silence, 15' radius]]'', ''[[withdraw]]'', ''[[wyvern watch]]'', ''[[create food and water]]'', ''[[dispel magic]]'', ''[[glyph of warding]]'', ''[[prayer]]'', ''[[protection from fire]]'', ''[[starshine]]'', ''[[cure serious wounds]]'', ''[[divination]]'', ''[[protection from evil]]'', ''[[flame strike]]'', ''[[raise dead]]'', ''[[blade barrier]]'', ''[[heal]]''.
document_data.Possessions: He carried several [[magic item]]s including ''[[armor of command]]'', a ''[[shield of the holy]]'', a magic [[scimitar]] ''[[giant slayer]]'', a ''[[ring of spell turning]]'', and a ''[[potion of extra-healing]]''. Sa'ib also armed himself with a [[mace]], ''[[jambiya]]'', a [[sling]], and a razor.
